typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		ntt_debteligibilityreviewid as string,
		createdby as string,
		ntt_eligibilitystatusid as string,
		ntt_debteligibilityreviewtypeid as string,
		ntt_creditornotes as string,
		ownerid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		ntt_debtid as string,
		owninguser as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_courtdecisionnotes as string,
		ntt_moneyadvisernotes as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceStaging
sourceStaging derive(tsCreatedOn = toTimestamp(createdon),
		tsModifiedOn = toTimestamp(modifiedon),
		strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewId = toString(ntt_debteligibilityreviewid),
		strNTTDebtId = toString(ntt_debtid),
		strNTTEligibilityStatusId = toString(ntt_eligibilitystatusid)) ~> decolTypeConvertion
decolTypeConvertion derive(blIsValid = iif(isNull(tsCreatedOn) || isNull(tsModifiedOn) || isNull(strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewId) || isNull(strNTTEligibilityStatusId) || isNull(strNTTDebtId), toBoolean('0'), toBoolean('1'))) ~> dcolIsValid
dcolIsValid derive(tsCreatedOn = coalesce(tsCreatedOn, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		tsModifiedOn = coalesce(tsModifiedOn, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewId = coalesce(strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewId,'missing'),
		strNTTDebtId = coalesce(strNTTDebtId, 'missing'),
		strNTTEligibilityStatusId = coalesce(strNTTEligibilityStatusId, 'missing')) ~> dcolMandatoryValue
dcolMandatoryValue derive(blIsTruncate = iif(length(strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewId) > 36 || length(strNTTDebtId) > 36 || length(strNTTEligibilityStatusId) > 36, toBoolean('1'), toBoolean('0'))) ~> dcolIsTruncate
dcolIsTruncate derive(strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewId = left(strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewId, 36),
		strNTTDebtId = left(strNTTDebtId, 36),
		strNTTEligibilityStatusId = left(strNTTEligibilityStatusId, 36)) ~> dcolMandatoryTruncate
dcolMandatoryTruncate filter(strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewId != "missing") ~> FilterValidation
FilterValidation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkValidation
